tweet: All right.  Sobering up w/diet coke and potatoes.  Locating clean clothes and work badge.  Can't avoid Monday. Like a bloody cannon.
It's probably a poor idea to get shit-faced on a Sunday night.  Poor choices are my tyrannosaurus.
Have decided to knit instead of studying Spanish.  I won't be able to talk to the day laborers, but they'll have pretty scarves this winter!
I made a Pac-Man reference and my father accused me of dating myself.  I'm officially in hell.
Another bridal shower?  Seriously?  Lady, please apply a filter to your email noting that I'm over 30 and entirely too bitter for this.
